title: Coronavirus MORE POWERFUL than first thought after terrifying super-spreader revelation | World | News | Express.co.uk
content: The Nanjing scientists published a research letter explaining their findings and warning that, contrary to earlier studies, COVID-19 was not likely to slowdown when temperatures rise. Trending They said: "Previous studies have demonstrated that the transmission rate of a virus is significantly weakened in an environment with high temperature and humidity.
warning: Based on the content, language and advertisements on this page, it can be assumed that this page is credible!
